dt: {bc}putting an end to debate or question especially by reason of irrefutability

pt: {sc}conclusive{/sc} {sc}decisive{/sc} {sc}determinative{/sc} {sc}definitive{/sc} mean bringing to an end. {sc}conclusive{/sc} applies to reasoning or logical proof that puts an end to debate or questioning.
{sc}decisive{/sc} may apply to something that ends a controversy, a contest, or any uncertainty.
{sc}determinative{/sc} adds an implication of giving a fixed character or direction.

pt.t: the {it}determinative{/it} factor in the court's decision

pt: {sc}definitive{/sc} applies to what is put forth as final and permanent.

shortdef: of, relating to, or being a conclusion
putting an end to debate or question especially by reason of irrefutability
